directions: Mix together artichokes, yogurt, Parmesan cheese, arugula, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, and pepper. Refrigerate for at least one hour before serving for flavors to blend. Serve with grilled pita triangles or pita chips.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and coarsely chopped
1 cup Dannon Oikos Plain Greek Nonfat Yogurt
1 cup coarsely chopped baby arugula leaves
Fresh cracked black pepper to taste
Grilled pita bread, cut into triangles, or pita chips
title: Provencal Tomato and Artichoke Dip
